thread.title: David Beckham watches Manchester United vs Southampton EFL Cup final with three sons at Wembley
thread.title_full: David Beckham watches Manchester United vs Southampton EFL Cup final with three sons at Wembley

author: Liam Prenderville
title: David Beckham watches Manchester United vs Southampton EFL Cup final with three sons at Wembley
text:
Sport David Beckham watches Manchester United vs Southampton EFL Cup final with three sons at Wembley The United legend watched his former club take on Southampton with the first silverware of the season up for grabs and was seen celebrating their opening goal Share David Beckham celebrates the first Manchester United goal during the EFL Cup Final (Photo: Rex Features) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
David Beckham was back at Wembley on Sunday for the EFL Cup final. 
The Manchester United legend watched his former club take on Southampton with the first silverware of the season up for grabs. 
During his time at Old Trafford, Beckham never won the competition and got behind United as Jose Mourinho eyed his first trophy as manager. 
Beckham sat with sons Brooklyn, Romeo and Cruz and was pictured celebrating as United took the lead. 
Zlatan Ibrahimovic curled United in front with a fine free-kick before Jesse Lingard doubled the lead. David Beckham watches on at Wembley (Photo: Rex Features) David Beckham, along with his sons at Wembley (Photo: Rex Features) David Beckham, along with his sons Romeo and Brooklyn, celebrates (Photo: Rex Features) Read More Manchester United vs Southampton live score, goal updates 
Manolo Gabbiadini hit back with a brace to level the scores. 
Beckham met up with former teammates Gary and Phil Neville to celebrate the latter's 40th birthday earlier this week. 
The ex-England captain flew into Paris for the occasion before travelling to London for the cup final. poll loading Were Manchester United right to sell Beckham? 500+ VOTES SO FAR
